title: IP Address Decoder
description:
IP4_DECODE decodes the in STR stored string as a IP v4 address and reï¿¾turns it as a DWORD. A return of 0 means an invalid address or an address

of '0.0.0.0 ' was evaluated. IP4 may be used for evaluating a Subnet Mask

of the IP v4 format.
name: IP4_DECODE

input.name: STR
input.description: A string that contains the IPv4 address.

return_value.description: Returns the decoded IPv4 address as a DWORD. A return value of 0 indicates that the address is invalid or '0.0.0.0'.
